overview: "Pay as you go" is taking on sexy new connotations thanks to Vouyer Media and celebrated director Greg Centuaro. The acclaimed actor/filmmaker is teaching some of Europe’s finest beauties how to "pay as you blow" in Pay You With My Mouth, the all-new, ten-scene tribute to oral gratification from VM’s Vouyer Raw label. Tanned and svelte, raven-haired Madison Parker kicks off the action in grand fashion. Greg Centauro’s girls are using their heads again, and the result is 100% oral satisfaction. Guaranteed.
title: Pay You With My Mouth
